title: Odd N Even
company_name: A game made with vanilla HTML, CSS and JS
description: Odd N Even is a simple game where you are presented with a number and you have to click a button or use arrow keys or swipe on the screen(Android) to tell if that number is even or odd. This app is a PWA, so it can be installed in any device. This has a simple backend just to store the global leaderboard.

title: QuotesApp
description: A simple CRUD application where users can add data and can remove it(if local-storage stats are stored), Like and dislike others quotes

title: Portfolio + Blog
description: This very webpage is one of my best frontend creations. Built with saber.js (a vue.js framework) this website is static-built like gatsby and is super fast. And using the full potential of React, there are a lot of things here

title: HandyWriter
description: With the help of marked.js, this app turns your markdown to HTML and normal text

title: Simple Parallax Effect
description: Without using any frameworks like bootstrap, I made this landing page with parallax scrolling, animated buttons and scroll to posItion, this is basically a CSS showcase of my skills
